alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Harnett; Johnston; Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 1:46PM EDT until March 31 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sampson County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Harnett County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Cumberland County in central North Carolina... Southern Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 145 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Godwin, or 18 miles northwest of Clinton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithfield, Dunn, Benson, Four Oaks, Newton Grove, Falcon and Spivey`s Corner. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
